TopicTitle: Do Not Taunt the Magic Boulder!

Articles.Content: Do not corrupt the Magic Boulder's wishes.
Do not put the magic boulder into an equatorial orbit.
Do not post Star Wars memes in threads relating to the Magic Boulder.

![Image result for star wars memes](http://i.amz.mshcdn.com/6yJ-1e0DJC1vJY7yhgnlTK43Bt0=/fit-in/850x850/http%3A%2F%2Fmashable.com%2Fwp-content%2Fgallery%2Fstar-wars-memes%2Fstar-wars-demotivational-poster.jpg)

Do not tell the magic boulder things it does not wish to know!
Do not make the Magic Boulder scream "NOOOOOO!"
Don't talk about mining to the magic Boulder. It is sensitive, you know.
Do not send the Magic Boulder on an escape trajectroy out of the Kerbol system.
Do not land the Magic boulder on Kerbin.
Do not tell the Magic Boulder you don't like it's color. The Magic Boulder is very sensitive about it's glowing patches of color.
Do not insult the magic Boulder.
Do no tint the magic boulder!
Do not remove magic from the Magic Boulder via magic.
Do not let the magic Boulder hear of the BFR ICT.
Do not Magic Boulder the Magic Boulder.
Do not let the magic boulder come into contact with the Tardis.
Pay close attention to tag on side of Magic Boulder: "DO NOT EAT"
do not yawn at the magic boulder ...
Do not lick the magic boulder....
If you find the magic bolder put it into a 15km orbit around Ike as soon as possible
Do not compose a soundtrack for the Magic Boulder.
Do not let the magic boulder watch anime.
Do not magicc boulder

Do not magic the boulder! 

.

.

.

.

You magiced the boulder, didn't you.
Do not insult the magic boulder because doing so will make its best friend (the kraken) appear and proced to tear your spacecraft to shreds
Do not use the magic boulder's powers around small children.
